attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All members of society need to support one another to achieve one's potential, with support & assistance.
Society before the creation of the NHS had the Poor Laws & Workhouses to support members of the community in timesof need, what we have now are people who cliam means tested benefits that they are not entitled to but the system is generous with cash payments.
I propose the modern Community cohension Workhouses are introduced at Parish Levels to support those members that require support to reintergrate those individuals back to supporting themselving to make a contribution back to society and themsvles and to the communitythat will support them.
I call upon the Department of Work & Pensions to make payments of means tested benefits the responibility of the parishes only to those in need of assistance and the voluntary work for the benefit of the parish Area is undertaken by those seeking assistance that are deemed medically fit, rather than expecting taxpayers/council tax payers to bear the costs for no return back to the community
